Class WLineF

java.lang.Object
  eu.webtoolkit.jwt.WLineF

public class WLineF
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class that defines a single line.

Constructor Detail

WLineF

public WLineF()
Default constructor.

Constructs a line from (x1=0,y1=0) to (x2=0,y2=0).
